channel.title: Hosting Without Portforwarding Problem
channel.description:
Okay, here is the thing, I had my server up perfectly for about a week and then power surge. Everything shut off for a while, and then i tried getting it back up. And i have my no - ip duc. Utorrent is correct on the options, the no-ip duc has my new IP, runs server fine until my friends try to sign in the server. They can't get in.
Help massively appreciated...
Thanks, Inferno

item.title: Hosting Without Portforwarding Problem
item.dc:creator: @inferno_vann inferno vann
item.description:
@inferno_vann wrote:

Tried that, and I have read at least 20 tutorials trying to figure it out. And there is an exception for it already, for both utorrent and no - ip server.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting Without Portforwarding Problem
item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

This Happened To Me Many Of Times…Make Sure Your Firewall Isnt Blocking it> Add It Into Your Firewall

Read full topic

item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Look up a uTorrent tutorial. You’re not doing it right.
